channel.title: Help with Webclient error!
channel.description:
i haven't tryed much to fix it because i don't want to stuff it up and when ever i try it never works .. so need help with someone fixing this for me its the class8.java when i compile i get error's:
[code]:: Preparing for compile... Done! :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... Done! :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... Done! :: Compiling... Class8.java:116: illegal start of expression if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:116: not a statement if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:116: 'else' without 'if' if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:116: illegal start of expression if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:116: ';' expected if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ Class8.java:118: not a statement Class8 class8; ^ Class8.java:118: ';' expected Class8 class8; ^ Class8.java:118: not a statement Class8 class8; ^ Class8.java:199: not a statement ioexception1; ^ Class8.java:210: not a statement exception; ^ Class8.java:219: illegal start of expression goto _L3 ^ Class8.java:220: ';' expected _L2: ^ 12 errors :: Done! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Any ideas how i can fix ??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 05:50:08 am[/size][hr]i heard it was the compiler if so what one do i need?

item.title: Help with Webclient error!
item.dc:creator: @The_Mistake The Mistake
item.description:
@The_Mistake wrote:

This is… Relativley easy to fix if you look at the code errors VERY closely. Usually, if you mess something up in a source, you end up with hundreds of errors, right? Well actually, no. The one error you made affects the agreement with some things and it goes on and on. I just learned how to do it last night. Let me try to help you.

:: Preparing for compile… Done!
:: Auto-setting envriomental variables… Done!
::
:: Scanning for latest JDK version… Done!
:: Compiling…
Class8.java:116: illegal start of expression
if(i >= 9250,) goto _L2; else goto _L1
^
Class8.java:116: not a statement
if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1
^
Class8.java:116: ‘else’ without ‘if’
if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1
^
Class8.java:116: illegal start of expression
if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1
^
Class8.java:116: ‘;’ expected
if(i >= 9250) goto _L2; else goto _L1
^
Class8.java:118: not a statement
Class8 class8;
^
Class8.java:118: ‘;’ expected
Class8 class8;
^
Class8.java:118: not a statement
Class8 class8;
^
Class8.java:199: not a statement
ioexception1;
^
Class8.java:210: not a statement
exception;
^
Class8.java:219: illegal start of expression
goto _L3
^
Class8.java:220: ‘;’ expected
_L2:
^
12 errors
:: Done!
Press any key to continue . . .

I fixed the first error I think… Try it.

Read full topic
